casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Noui PHACHOUMPHONE 65PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 William D. Spence, Attorney at Law, for Phachoumphone, Noui. M. Elizabeth Guzman, Assistant Attorney General, Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

*806The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 5th of December 2018 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 16th day of January 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
